entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
